articles.title: Women and men mistakenly given different advice to prevent heart disease - EurekAlert
articles.description: Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a scientific congress organised by the European Society of Cardiology (ESC), the Asian Pacific…
articles.content: Singapore – 3 December 2022:  Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a sc… [+3365 chars]

articles.title: China's Xi told EU less lethal Omicron opens way for fewer COVID restrictions - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping blamed mass protests in Chinese cities on youth frustrated by years of the COVID-19 pandemic, but said the now dominant Omicron variant of the virus paved the way for fewer restrictions, European Union officials said.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Chinese President Xi Jinping blamed mass protests in Chinese cities on youth frustrated by years of the COVID-19 pandemic, but said the now dominant Omicron variant of the… [+1715 chars]
